entries.name: external
entries.desc: Whether to run the rdoc process as an external shell (default is false)

entries.name: generator
entries.desc: Name of format generator (--format) used by rdoc. (defaults to rdoc's default)

entries.name: main
entries.desc: Name of file to be used as the main, top level file of the RDoc. (default is none)

entries.name: markup
entries.desc: Comment markup format.  rdoc, rd and tomdoc are supported.  (default is 'rdoc')

entries.name: name
entries.desc: Name of the main, top level task.  (default is :rdoc)

entries.name: options
entries.desc: Additional list of options to be passed rdoc.  (default is [])

entries.name: rdoc_dir
entries.desc: Name of directory to receive the html output files. (default is “html”)

entries.name: rdoc_files
entries.desc: List of files to be included in the rdoc generation. (default is [])

entries.name: template
entries.desc: Name of template to be used by rdoc. (defaults to rdoc's default)

entries.name: title
entries.desc: Title of RDoc documentation. (defaults to rdoc's default)

entries.name: new(name = :rdoc)
entries.desc: Create an RDoc task with the given name. See the RDoc::Task class overview for documentation.

entries.name: before_running_rdoc(&block)
entries.desc: The block passed to this method will be called just before running the RDoc generator. It is allowed to modify RDoc::Task attributes inside the block.

entries.name: check_names(names)
entries.desc: Ensures that names only includes names for the :rdoc, :clobber_rdoc and :rerdoc.  If other names are given an ArgumentError is raised.

entries.name: clobber_task_description()
entries.desc: Task description for the clobber rdoc task or its renamed equivalent

entries.name: define()
entries.desc: Create the tasks defined by this task lib.

entries.name: option_list()
entries.desc: List of options that will be supplied to RDoc

entries.name: rdoc_task_description()
entries.desc: Task description for the rdoc task or its renamed equivalent

entries.name: rerdoc_task_description()
entries.desc: Task description for the rerdoc task or its renamed description
